p: Angiotensin II activates NF-κB in monocytes with proinflammatory effects, and RAS inhibitors also decrease NF-κB activation and neutrophil chemotaxis ( 115). Moreover, angiotensin converting enzyme (ACE) affects pulmonary vascular tone and permeability, epithelial cell apoptosis, and lung fibrosis via fibroblast activation so that RAS inhibitors may be beneficial in ARDS.
